ComicInfo.Summary:
When ZIM and Dib receive the same Irken distress signal from the stormiest place on Earth-Pandora's Quadrangle-they both race to answer it. But the horrible surprise at the Quadrangle's core will lead them both (and GIR! Don't forget GIR!) to a far corner of the universe, and a world where neither of them are welcome. Part one of a four-part story!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Maddie C. (a) & Fred C. Stresing (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Simon Troussellier | 2 | RE | Rose City Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Drew Rausch | Missing |
